text:
Hello boys and girls. Hi. We are playing with
some toys.

Maggie: Yeah!
Look, Maggie is playing with the blocks. Say

hello Maggie.
Maggie: Hello! Hello!

Uuh, what´s that? Look, a toy train.
Maggie: Yeah!

Wow! Hey, if I was small I could drive the
toy train.

Maggie: OK, Steve. Abracadabra!
Thanks, Maggie. Look, I am so small. And 
look at the toy train. Come on, let´s drive

the train!
Maggie: Yeah!

Yeah! Look at my toy train. Wow! Come on,
let´s go! Yeah!

Hello, look at me!
Maggie: Oh no! Steve! Look out! Look out!

Oh no! Stop!
Oh dear! Oh, hey. Oh, what is it? Look. What´s

that? Yeah, it´s a block. Say with me – It´s
a block. It´s a block. Now say it like this.

Say. It´s – a – block. Come on, are you
ready? It´s – a – block. It´s – a

– block. And again. It´s – a – block.
Yeah! But what colour is it? It´s yellow.

Yeah! It´s a yellow block. Maggie, move the
yellow block, please.

Maggie: OK!
Thank you!

Maggie: Yeah!
So, come on. Let´s go. Yeah! This is great!

Maggie: Oh no! Stop the train!
Oh not again!

Maggie: Steve! Stop!
Steve: Stop!

Maggie: Stop!
What´s that? Look, what is it? What is it?

Oh, look! It´s Lego. Yeah! Say with me. Are
you ready? It´s – Lego. It´s – Lego.

It´s – Lego. Come on! It´s – Lego. It´s
– Lego. One last time. It´s – Lego. Yeah!

But look. What colour is it? Yeah. It´s blue.
It´s blue Lego.

Move the blue Lego please Maggie!
OK!

Thank you! Ok, come on.
Maggie: Yeah!

Let´s go again. Yeah!
This is fun!

Steve, be careful!
Oh no!

Steve and Maggie: Stop the train!
What is it now? Look, it´s a green yo-yo.
